analysis: The documents primarily concern adjustments to the rates of pay and allowances for various categories of federal employees, including those in the General Schedule, Foreign Service, Veterans Health Administration, Senior Executive Service, uniformed services, and members of Congress, the judiciary, and administrative law judges. The documents reflect routine, periodic updates to compensation, often citing specific laws and statutory authorities for the adjustments. Some documents also address interim geographic adjustments and cost-of-living adjustments.
title: Federal Employee Compensation Updates
